page.title: 01ARTS AND CRAFTS
page.content:
ARTS AND CRAFTS
WITH A CHURCH AND CHAPEL IN THE AREA AND TWO WOMENS INSTITUTES CLOSE BY THERE IS NO SHORTAGE OF TALENT IN THIS FIELD.LOCALS LIST KNITTING AND SEWING AS THEIR TOP CRAFTS.THERE ARE MANY FETES AND BAZAARS HELD LOCALLY AND WITH A BUS JOURNEY TO A CLOTHING STORE (OR CAR JOURNEY) VILLAGERS STILL TEND TO USE THEIR SKILLS AND MAKE THEIR OWN CLOTHES.THIS OF COURSE IS A MONEY SAVING TASK AS WELL AS A HOBBY AND THERE IS NOT THAT MUCH TO DO IN THE EVENINGS IN THE AREA SO TO OCCUPY ONESELF IN THIS WAY IS FELT TO BE BETTER THAN JUST WATCHING THE TELEVISION.
